name: Forest Keepers
description:
Be the protector of nature!

      Invite your friends to embark on this cooperative adventure  available for two players. Help the two forest rangers keep the park safe from catastrophes that can occur at any time: rescue trapped animals, put out fires, destroy mining points, and contain livestock.

-->Available in 6 languages<-- English, Portuguese, French, Spanish, Italian and Japanese

      This game was exclusively produced in the Student Game Jam organized by the Pontifical Catholic University of Minas Gerais, located in Brazil.  This work was carried out with love, and in the end, we were very proud of the result,  so we decided to share it with the world. 😊
       We are planning to keep the game updated constantly with new challenges and new levels.

         We hope from the bottom of our hearts that you like it too. Our team consists of students, and we are eager for your comment and feedback. ❤️

Check out our fanpage on Facebook.

Art 🎨Programming ⌨️Ana Laura Meira - Scenario ModellingDiogo Rocha - Shader ProgrammerIsabelle Oliveira - Character Modelling, Concept Designer, Level Designer, Texture & UIGabriel Habran - Mechanics ProgrammerJaelcio Dutra -  AnimatorMarcelo Chaves - Mechanics & UI ProgrammerRodrigo Vieira - Composing Assets, Scenario Modelling, SFX & Soundtrack
